title: Myrtia
description: A health food store/cosmetics & beauty supply/ bookstore founded in 1993; is the oldest health food store in Greece. Carries the latest products. Sells organic food, vegan food, supplements, herbs, alternative books, crystals, incense, natural cosmetics, aromatherapy products and all related species. Also is happy to answer any questions. Owner has been trained in aesthetics, as an assistant pharmacist, in Ennallaktikes treatments and clinical aromatherapy. Sells only selected and certified products.
